title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Phone Call with Prime Minister Theresa May of the United Kingdom – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
October 2, 2017
President Donald J. Trump spoke today with Prime Minister Theresa May of the United Kingdom, who conveyed her condolences regarding the mass shooting in Las Vegas on Sunday night. President Trump thanked Prime Minister May and praised the first responders in Las Vegas for their immediate and continued actions.
